description: Dashboard of data exported from Heketi via Prometheus Service as deployed by OpenShift Container Storage (OCS) 3.x.

targets.expr: (sum by (hostname, device) ( heketi_device_used_bytes {job = "$job"} )) / (sum by (hostname, device) ( heketi_device_size_bytes {job = "$job"} ))
